variants.summary: This spell allows spellcasters to put a curse on a creature and deal additional Necrotic damage to them. The curse also imposes Disadvantage on the creature's Charisma checks.
variants.description: Deal an additional 1d6|Necrotic Necrotic|damage when you attack the target and impart Disadvantage on Charisma Checks.

name: Hold Monster
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to Paralyse a creature, preventing them from acting and making them vulnerable to attacks.
description:
Paralyse a creature. It can't Move, Act, or React. Attacks from within m=3|ft=10 are always Critical Hits.
* No effect on undead.

name: Hold Person
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to hold a target humanoid in place. The affected creature is unable to move and act and is much more susceptible to attacks.
description:
Hold a humanoid enemy still. They can't Move, Act, or React. Attacks from within m=3|ft=10 are always Critical Hits.

At the end of each turn, the affected creature can make a Wisdom SavingThrow to end this condition.
higherLevels: Upcast: Affects an additional target for each Spell Slot Level above 2nd.

name: Hunger of Hadar
summary: It creates an area that deals damage and inflicts conditions to creatures in it, including reduced movement speed.
description:
Creatures within this black sphere are Blinded and take damage at the end of their turn and the start of their turn.

Creatures starting their turn in the area take 2d6|Cold damage. Creatures ending their turn in the area possibly take 2d6|Acid damage.

The area is Difficult Terrain.

name: Hunter's Mark
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to mark a creature as their prey and deal additional Physical damage to the targeted creature.
description:
Mark a creature as your quarry to deal an additional 1d6|Physical|drs=t damage whenever you hit it with a weapon attack.

If the target dies before the spell ends, you can use Reapply Hunter's Mark to mark a new creature.

name: Hypnotic Pattern
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to hypnotise all creatures within an area.
description:
Hypnotise creatures that can see the pattern. They cannot attack you. They cannot move nor act.

This spell can be cast while you are Silenced.

name: Ice Knife
summary: The caster throws a shard of ice, which explodes and leaves behind an icy surface.
description:
Throw a shard of ice that deals 1d10|Piercing damage. It explodes and deals 2d6|Cold damage to anyone nearby. It leaves an Ice Surface. On miss, the shard of ice still explodes.

This spell can be cast while you are Silenced.
higherLevels: Upcast: Casting this spell at a higher level deals an extra 1d6|Cold damage for each Spell Slot Level above 1st.

name: Ice Storm
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to summon an ice storm to strike an area.
description: Impel a storm of hail and ice to crash from the sky, covering the ground and striking all objects and creatures within range, dealing Bludgeoning and Cold damage. It also creates an Ice Surface that lasts 2 turns.
higherLevels: Upcast: Casting this spell at a higher level deals an extra 1d8|Bludgeoning damage for each Spell Slot Level above 4th.

name: Inflict Wounds
summary: This spell allows the spellcaster to make a melee attack that inflicts Necrotic damage.
description: Putrefy a creature with Necrotic energy filling your hands.
higherLevels: Upcast: Deals an additional 1d10|Necrotic damage per level.

name: Insect Plague
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to create a damaging, debilitating swarm of insects over a section of the battlefield.
description: Locusts attack everyone within range, make the area Difficult Terrain, and impose Disadvantage on Perception Checks.
higherLevels: Upcast: Casting this spell at a higher level deals an extra 1d10|Piercing damage for each Spell Slot Level above 5th.

name: Invisibility
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to turn themselves and other creatures Invisible to the naked eye.
description:
Touch a creature to turn it Invisible. Attacks against it have Disadvantage. It attacks with Advantage.

Invisibility breaks when you fail Stealth Checks on attacking, casting spells, or interacting with items.Bug

Condition ends early if the creature attacks or casts a spell.
higherLevels: Upcast: Affects an additional target for each Spell Slot Level above 2nd.

name: Knock
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to unlock non-magical locks.
description: Unlock an object that is held shut by a mundane lock.

name: Lesser Restoration
summary: This spell allows the spellcaster to cure an adjacent creature.
description: Cure a creature from diseased, poisoned, Paralysis, or blinded.

name: Light
summary: It makes an object shed light in a small area.
description: Infuse an object with an aura of light. Only affects one target at a time.

name: Lightning Arrow
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to fire an arrow of electricity that bursts on impact, dealing additional Lightning|Lightning damage to creatures in the vicinity.
description: After the arrow hits, smaller bolts snake out from the target towards nearby creatures.

name: Lightning Bolt
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to discharge a bolt of lightning in any direction, potentially hitting multiple creatures.
description: Call forth a blast of lightning that hits all creatures in the line of the eruption.
higherLevels: Upcast: Casting this spell at a higher level deals an extra 1d6|Lightning for each Spell Slot Level above 3rd.

name: Longstrider
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to make a creature move farther during a turn.
description: Increase a creature's Movement Speed by m=3|ft=10.
higherLevels: Upcast: Affect an additional target for each Spell Slot Level above 1st.

name: Mage Armour
summary: This spell allows unarmoured spellcasters to surround themselves with magical protection.
description:
Surround an unarmoured creature in a protective magical force. Its 13 + its Dexterity modifier.

Prerequisite: The target can't be wearing Armour.

name: Mage Hand
summary: It conjures a spectral hand that can interact with objects.
description:
Create a spectral hand that can manipulate and interact with objects.

Duration: 10 turns.

This cantrip can only be cast once per short rest.

name: Magic Missile
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to hit enemies with multiple projectiles that deal Force damage.
description:
Create three darts of magical force, each dealing 1d4 + 1|Force damage to its target.

The darts always hit their target, and can each be targeted individually.
higherLevels: When the spell is cast at 2nd Level or higher, an additional dart is created for each Spell Slot Level above 1st.

name: Magic Weapon
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to infuse a weapon with arcane energy, making it magical.
description: Infuse a weapon with arcane energy. The weapon becomes magical, receiving a +1 bonus to Attack Rolls and Damage Rolls.
higherLevels: Upcast: Casting this spell using a 4th or 5th level Spell Slot will increase the bonus by 2, and a 6th level Spell Slot will increase it by 3.

name: Mass Cure Wounds
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to heal several of their allies.
description:
Unleash a soothing hum of energy that heals you and nearby allies.

No effect on Undead and Constructs
higherLevels: Upcast: Casting this spell at a higher level heals an extra 1d8|Healing for each Spell Slot Level above 5th.

name: Mass Healing Word
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to heal several allies that they can see within range.
description: Call out words of restoration to heal up to 6 creatures for 1d4 + Spellcasting Modifier|Healing.
higherLevels: When this spell is cast using a 4th level slot or higher, targets heal an extra 1d4|Healing for each Spell Slot Level above 3rd.

name: Melf's Acid Arrow
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to shoot a magical arrow that deals Acid|Acid damage to a target on impact and at the end of its next turn.
description:
Shoot a green arrow that bursts in a spray of acid. Deals 4d4|Acid damage immediately and 2d4|Acid damage at the end of the target's next turn.

If the spell misses, the target still takes half the initial damage, but no damage at the end of its next turn.
higherLevels: Upcast: Casting this spell at a higher level deals an extra 2d4|Acid damage (1d4|Acid on impact and at the end of target's turn) for each Spell Slot Level above 2nd.

name: Minor Illusion
summary: It conjures a simple illusion to distract creatures.
description:
Create an illusion that compels nearby creatures to investigate.

You can remain hidden while casting this spell.

This spell can be cast while you are Silenced.

Duration: 10 turns.

name: Mirror Image
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to create 3 illusory duplicates of themselves to distract attackers.
description:
Create 3 illusory duplicates of yourself to distract attackers. Each duplicate increases your Armour Class by 3. 

Whenever you successfully evade an attack, one of the duplicates disappears.

name: Misty Step
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to teleport themselves to an unoccupied space that they can see.
description: Surrounded by silver mist, you teleport to an unoccupied space you can see.

name: Moonbeam
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to call down a beam of moonlight that deals Radiant damage to any creature that enters the beam or starts its turn there.
description:
Call down a silvery beam of pale light that deals 2d10|Radiant damage to any creatures that enters it or starts its turn in the light. You can use an Action to move the beam ranged. On a successful Constitution SavingThrow, targets still take half damage.

10

When cast, the spellcaster gains the following ability:
* Move Moonbeam: Move the beam of moonlight up to ranged.
higherLevels: Upcast: When the spell is cast at 3rd level or higher, damage increases by 1d10|Radiant for each Spell Slot Level above 2nd.

name: Otiluke's Freezing Sphere
description: Create a ball of churning ice that can be launched instantly to generate a frosty explosion or stored for later use.

variants.name: Otiluke's Freezing Sphere
variants.description: Launch a ball of churning ice that explodes and damages all creatures and objects within range.

variants.name: Otiluke's Conveniently Portable Freezing Sphere
variants.description: Create a vessel for Otiluke's Freezing Sphere. Put it in your pocket, give it to an ally, or throw it away. It will explode after 10 turn(s).

name: Otiluke's Resilient Sphere
description: Enclose a target in a sphere of shimmering force, reducing its movement speed by half, and blocking all incoming and outgoing damage

name: Otto's Irresistible Dance
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to force a creature to stay in place, inactive.
description: Cause a creature to start dancing, making it unable to take Actions or Move. Its attackers have Advantage on Attack Rolls. The dancer has Disadvantage on Attack Rolls and Dexterity SavingThrows.

name: Pass Without Trace
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to grants themselves and nearby allies a bonus to Stealth Checks.
description: Call forth a veil of shadow and silence that gives you and nearby allies a +10 bonus to Stealth Checks.

name: Phantasmal Force
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to flood a target creature's mind with an illusion of the last thing that attacked it, dealing 1d6|Psychic damage per turn, changing to the last type of damage inflicted upon the target.
description: Deal damage to a creature each turn. The type of damage changes to the last type of damage the creature suffered.

name: Phantasmal Killer
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to temporarily haunt a creatures mind with illusions, dealing damage, prevents movement, and has Disadvantage on Ability Checks and Attack Rolls.
description: Haunt a creature with illusions of its greatest fears. It takes 4d10|Psychic Damage per turn, cannot move, has Disadvantage on Ability Checks and Attack Rolls
higherLevels: * When this spell is cast at 5th Level or higher, it deals an additional 1d10|Psychic damage per level per turn.

name: Planar Ally
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to summon an Elemental, Celestial, or Fiend for aid.
description:
Beseech one of these otherworldly entities for aid. Summon either an Elemental, Celestial, or Fiend to fight for you.

Until Long Rest

variants.name: Planar Ally: Djinni
variants.summary: This spell is a variant of the Level 6 Conjuration Spell, Planar Ally. It allows spellcasters to summon an Elemental for aid.
variants.description:
Conjure a powerful Djinni to fight alongside you.

Until Long Rest

Its Djinni Scimitar attack deals the following damage: 
1d6 + 6|Slashing + 2d10|Poison

It can cast (without expending a Spell Slot):
* Thunderwave
* Drunken Inhale

It also has access to the following Class Actions:
* Sweetplum Gales
* Shifting Winds

variants.name: Planar Ally: Deva
variants.summary: This spell is a variant of the Level 6 Conjuration Spell, Planar Ally. It allows spellcasters to summon a Celestial for aid.
variants.description: Conjure a Celestial Deva to fight alongside you. It can cast Wrathful Smite, Revivify, and Concussive Smash.

variants.name: Planar Ally: Cambion
variants.summary: This spell is a variant of the Level 6 Conjuration Spell, Planar Ally. It allows spellcasters to summon a Fiend for aid.
variants.description: Conjure a Celestial Cambion to fight alongside you.

name: Planar Binding
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to take control of a Celestial, Elemental, Fey, or Fiend.
description:
Target an otherworldly creature and attach its consciousness to your own. It will follow and fight for you as an ally.

Target must be a Celestial, Elemental, Fey, or a Fiend.

name: Plant Growth
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to cause an area to expel weeds from the ground, quartering the movement speed of all creatures travelling through the area.
description:
Make weeds burst from the ground and smother the area. Creatures moving through the weeds have their Movement Speed quartered.
* There is no SavingThrow against this effect.
* Any Fire damage will burn away the surface, effectively ending the spell.

name: Poison Spray
summary: This cantrip allows spellcasters to deal Poison damage to a target.
description: Project a puff of noxious gas, dealing 1d12|Poison to a target.
higherLevels:
* When the spellcaster reaches Level 5, the damage increases by another d12|Poison Poison|1d12 Poison damage, for a total of 2d12|Poison.
* When the spellcaster reaches Level 10, the damage increases by another d12|Poison Poison|1d12 Poison damage, for a total of 3d12|Poison.

name: Polymorph
summary: This spell transforms a creature into a sheep.
description: Transform a creature into a harmless sheep. If the sheep's Hit Points drop to 0, the target reverts to its original form with its original Hit Points.

name: Prayer of Healing
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to heal all allies within range.
description:
Heal all allies you can see within range by 2d8 + Spellcasting Modifier|Healing.

Can only be used outside of combat. This spell has no effect on Undead and Constructs.
higherLevels: When the spell is cast at 3rd Level or higher, heal a target an extra 1d8|Healing for each Spell Slot Level above 2nd.

name: Produce Flame
summary: This cantrip creates a blue flame in the caster's palm that emanates light and can be thrown at enemies.
description:
A flame in your hand sheds a light in a m=9|ft=30 radius and deals 1d8|Fire Fire|damage when thrown.

Throwing the flame immediately after you conjure it does not cost an Action. Extinguishing or throwing it on subsequent turns costs an Action. The throw has a range of m=9|ft=30.

name: Protection from Energy
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to grant a creature they touch Resistance to an element of their choice.
description: Touch a creature to grant it Resistance to Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder damage.

variants.name: Protection from Energy: Acid
variants.summary: This spell allows spellcasters to grant a creature they touch Resistance to Acid damage.
variants.description: Touch a creature to grant it Resistance to Acid damage.

variants.name: Protection from Energy: Cold
variants.summary: This spell allows spellcasters to grant a creature they touch Resistance to Cold damage.
variants.description: Touch a creature to grant it Resistance to Cold damage.

variants.name: Protection from Energy: Fire
variants.summary: This spell allows spellcasters to grant a creature they touch Resistance to Fire damage.
variants.description: Touch a creature to grant it Resistance to Fire damage.

variants.name: Protection from Energy: Lightning
variants.summary: This spell allows spellcasters to grant a creature they touch Resistance to Lightning damage.
variants.description: Touch a creature to grant it Resistance to Lightning damage.

variants.name: Protection from Energy: Thunder
variants.summary: This spell allows spellcasters to grant a creature they touch Resistance to Thunder damage.
variants.description: Touch a creature to grant it Resistance to Thunder damage.

name: Protection from Evil and Good
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to surround themselves with magical protection against Aberrations, Celestials, Elementals, Fey, Fiends, and Undead.
description:
Protect an ally against the attacks and powers of Aberrations, Celestials, Elementals, Fey, Fiends, and Undead.

The targets can't be Charmed, Frightened, or possessed by them, and when these creatures attack it, they have Disadvantage.

name: Protection from Poison
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to grant a creature they touch protection from Poisonous effects.
description: Touch a creature to grant it protection against Poisonous influences. You neutralize all Poisons that affect it, grant it Advantage on SavingThrows against being Poisoned, and Resistance to Poison damage.

name: Ray of Enfeeblement
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to make a ranged spell attack against a creature and sap their Strength. A weakened creature deals half damage with weapon attacks that use Strength.
description: Weaken a foe: they deal half damage with weapon attacks using Strength.

name: Ray of Frost
summary: It deals Cold damage to the target and slows it down.
description: Reduces the target's Movement Speed by m=3|ft=10.
higherLevels:
When the spellcaster reaches Level 5, the damage increases to 2d8|Cold.
When the spellcaster reaches Level 10, the damage increases to 3d8|Cold.

name: Ray of Sickness
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to hit enemies with a ray of nauseating energy that deals Poison damage, and potentially Poisons them.
description: Possibly Poisons the target.
higherLevels: Upcast: Casting this spell at a higher level deals an extra 1d8|Poison damage for each Spell Slot Level above 1st.

name: Remove Curse
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to remove all curses afflicting a target through touch.
description: Touch a creature or object to remove all Curses and Hexes affecting it.

name: Resistance
summary: This cantrip grants a temporary bonus to a creature's SavingThrows.
description: Make a target more resistant to spell effects and conditions: it receives a d4|Physical +1d4 bonus to SavingThrows.

name: Revivify
summary: This spell allows the spellcaster to bring a dead Companion back to life.
description: Revive a companion. They return to life with 1 Hit point.

name: Sacred Flame
summary: It deals Radiant damage to a target.
description: Engulf a target in a flame-like radiance.
higherLevels:
* When the spellcaster reaches Level 5, the damage increases to 2d8|Radiant.
* When the spellcaster reaches Level 10, the damage increases to 3d8|Radiant.

name: Sanctuary
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to ward themselves or an ally against enemy attacks.
description:
You or an ally cannot be targeted until you attack or harm a creature. You can still take damage from area spells.

Until the affected entity attacks or harms another creature, it cannot be targeted by enemy attacks. However, it can still take damage from spells that influence a larger area.

name: Scorching Ray
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to hurl 3 rays of fire at targets within range. You can either target a single creature or multiple creatures with the rays. Each ray rolls a separate Attack Roll and deals Fire damage.
description: Hurl 3 rays of fire. Each ray deals 2d6|Fire damage.
higherLevels: Upcast: Casting this spell at a higher level hurls an additional ray for each Spell Slot Level above 2nd.

name: Searing Smite
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to cause their melee weapon to flare with white-hot intensity, searing their targets on hit.
description: Your weapon flares with white-hot intensity. It deals, on top of weapon damage, an extra 1d6|Fire damage and marks the target with Searing Smite.
higherLevels: Upcast: Casting this spell at a higher level deals an extra 1d6|Fire initial damage for each Spell Slot Level above 1st.

name: See Invisibility
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to see Invisible objects and creatures within range while not Incapacitated. Creatures within range which fail on a Dexterity Saving Throw are revealed to others.
description: Become able to see Invisible creatures, and possibly reveal them to others.

name: Seeming
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to disguise their allies.
description:
Disguise up to 4 members of your adventuring party.  Initial disguises are chosen at random.  Each affected party member may then choose a new disguise a single time as an Action.

Disguises last until dispelled as an Action using Dispel Disguise.

name: Shatter
summary: This spell allows the spellcaster to generate a deafening noise explosion that can damage multiple creatures and objects. This spell is extra potent against inorganic targets, who must make their Saving Throw at Disadvantage.
description:
Damages all nearby creatures and objects. Creatures made of inorganic material such as stone have Disadvantage on their SavingThrow. 

On Save: Targets still take half damage.
higherLevels: Upcast: Casting this spell at a higher level deals an extra 1d8|Thunder damage for each Spell Slot Level above 2nd.

name: Shield
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to avoid being hit by an enemy attack at the last possible instant. It also completely nullifies Magic Missile.
description: When you are about to be hit by an enemy, use your Reaction to increase your Armour Class by 5. You also take no damage from Magic Missile. These effects last until the start of your next turn.

name: Shield of Faith
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to surround themselves or an ally with divine protection and gain a bonus to their Armour Class.
description: Surround a creature with a shimmering field of magic that increases its Armour Class by 2.

name: Shillelagh
summary: It imbues the caster's weapon with nature power.
description:
Quarterstaff or Club Required.

Your staff or club becomes magical: it deals d8|Physical 1d8 + Wisdom Modifier|Bludgeoning damage, and uses your Spellcasting Ability for Attack Rolls.

name: Shocking Grasp
summary: It makes a melee attack that inflictsLightning damage and prevents the target from taking Reactions.
description: The target cannot use Reactions. This spell has Advantage on creatures with metal Armour.
higherLevels:
When the spellcaster reaches Level 5, the damage increases to 2d8|Lightning.
When the spellcaster reaches Level 10, the damage increases to 3d8|Lightning.

name: Silence
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to summon a sphere of absolute quietness in an area within range. Creatures within this sphere are immune to Thunder damage and cannot cast verbal spells.
description: Create a sound-proof sphere. All within are Silenced and Immune to Thunder damage.

name: Sleep
summary: It allows the spellcaster to temporarily make conscious creatures fall into a deep slumber.
description:
Put creatures into a magical slumber. Select targets up to a combined 24 Hit Points.

The condition ends upon taking damage.
higherLevels: Upcast: Affect creatures with more hit points at higher levels. The total hit points of creatures this spell can affect is increased by 8 hit points per level.

name: Sleet Storm
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to call forth a storm that douses fire, creates an Ice Surface, and disrupts the Concentration of spellcasters.
description:
Call forth a storm that douses fire, creates an Ice Surface, and forces spellcasters to succeed at a Concentration SavingThrow in order to maintain Concentration.

Ice is a surface that is considered Difficult Terrain. Creatures moving through it have their Movement Speed halved, and will fall Prone on a failed Dexterity SavingThrow.

name: Slow
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to reduce movement speed, Armour Class, and Dexterity Saving Throws, and limit actions.
description: Alter time around up to 6 enemies to Slow them. They won't get far, they can't do much, and they're easier to hit.

name: Speak with Animals
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to understand and talk to beasts and animals for a day.
description: Gain the ability to comprehend and communicate with beasts.

name: Speak with Dead
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to grant a semblance of life to a corpse, allowing it to answer questions.
description:
Grant a semblance of life to a corpse, allowing it to answer questions. 

Skeletons and creatures killed with Acid, Fire, Lightning, Necrotic, Radiant damage no longer have a mouth and can't be made to talk using this spell.

Casting this spell also grants the ability Recast Speak with Dead, which allows the spellcaster to recast the spell without expending a spell slot, until the next Long Rest.

name: Spike Growth
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to transform an area of land into a hazardous spiky terrain. Creatures walking through the area have their speed halved and take Piercing damage.
description:
Shape a piece of ground into hard spikes. A creature walking on the spikes takes 2d4|Piercing damage for every melee it moves.

The spikes are Difficult Terrain, halving a creature's Movement Speed.

name: Spirit Guardians
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to call forth spirits to damage nearby targets and slow their Movement.
description:
Call forth spirits to protect you. Nearby enemies take 3d8|Radiant or 3d8|Necrotic damage per turn, and their Movement Speed is halved. Lasts for 10 turns.

On a successful Save, targets still take half damage. 

Caster can't become Invisible while Concentrating on this spell.
higherLevels: When the spell is cast using a 4th Level spell slot or higher, damage increases by 1d8|Radiant or 1d8|Necrotic damage for each spell slot level above 3rd.

variants.name: Spirit Guardians: Radiant
variants.summary: This spell is a variation of the spell Spirit Guardians. This variant deals Radiant damage as well as slows the Movement of nearby enemies.
variants.description:
Call forth spirits to protect the area around you. Nearby enemies take 3d8|Radiant damage per turn, and their Movement Speed is halved. Lasts for 10 turns.

On a successful Save, targets still take half damage. 

Caster can't become Invisible while Concentrating on this spell.
variants.higherLevels: When the spell is cast using a 4th Level spell slot or higher, damage increases by 1d8|Radiant damage for each spell slot level above 3rd.

variants.name: Spirit Guardians: Necrotic
variants.summary: This spell is a variation of the spell Spirit Guardians. This variant deals Necrotic damage as well as slows the Movement of nearby enemies.
variants.description:
Call forth spirits to protect the area around you. Nearby enemies take 3d8|Necrotic damage per turn, and their Movement Speed is halved. Lasts for 10 turns.

On a successful Save, targets still take half damage. 

Caster can't become Invisible while Concentrating on this spell.
variants.higherLevels: When the spell is cast using a 4th Level spell slot or higher, damage increases by 1d8|Necrotic damage for each spell slot level above 3rd.

name: Spiritual Weapon
summary: Summons a floating weapon that can attack enemies. You can choose between several different weapons, and each has a different Weapon Action.
description:
Summon a floating, spectral weapon of your choice that attacks your enemies alongside you. The weapon is Ethereal, Immune to Psychic and Poison damage, and Resistant to all other Damage Types.

10. Only one Spiritual Weapon may be summoned at any time.
higherLevels: Upcast: For every 2 Spell Slot Levels higher than the original, the weapon gains 8 and deals an additional 1d8|Force damage.

variants.name: Spiritual Weapon: Greataxe
variants.summary: This spell is a variant of the Level 2 Evocation Spell, Spiritual Weapon. It allows spellcasters to summon a floating Greataxe that can attack enemies.
variants.description:
Summon a floating, spectral Greataxe. It can use:
* Greataxe Slash: Cleave into a target with your might head.
* Lacerate: Slash at your target's vital points to make it Bleed.
* Fly: Fly to a target position.
variants.higherLevels: Upcast: For every 2 Spell Slot Levels higher than the original, the weapon gains 8|Healing and deals an additional 1d8|Force damage.

variants.name: Spiritual Weapon: Greatsword
variants.summary: This spell is a variant of the Level 2 Evocation Spell, Spiritual Weapon. It allows spellcasters to summon a floating Greatsword that can attack enemies.
variants.description:
Summon a floating, spectral Greatsword. It can use:
* Greatsword Slash: Cleave into a target with your holy blade.
* Lacerate: Slash at your target's vital points to make it Bleed.
* Fly: Fly to a target position.
variants.higherLevels: Upcast: For every 2 Spell Slot Levels higher than the original, the weapon gains 8 and deals an additional 1d8|Force damage.

variants.name: Spiritual Weapon: Halberd
variants.summary: This spell is a variant of the Level 2 Evocation Spell, Spiritual Weapon. It allows spellcasters to summon a floating Halberd that can attack enemies.
variants.description:
Summon a floating, spectral Halberd. It can use:
* Halberd Slash: Cleave into a target with your might head.
* Lacerate: Slash at your target's vital points to make it Bleed.
* Fly: Fly to a target position.
variants.higherLevels: Upcast: For every 2 Spell Slot Levels higher than the original, the weapon gains 8|Healing and deals an additional 1d8|Force damage.

variants.name: Spiritual Weapon: Maul
variants.summary: This spell is a variant of the Level 2 Evocation Spell, Spiritual Weapon. It allows spellcasters to summon a floating Maul that can attack enemies.
variants.description:
Summon a floating, spectral Maul. It can use:
* Maul Blow: Smash into a target with your might head.
* Concussive Smash: Hit an enemy with all your might to deal damage and possibly Daze them.
* Fly: Fly to a target position.
variants.higherLevels: Upcast: For every 2 Spell Slot Levels higher than the original, the weapon gains 8|Healing and deals an additional 1d8|Force damage.

variants.name: Spiritual Weapon: Spear
variants.summary: This spell is a variant of the Level 2 Evocation Spell, Spiritual Weapon. It allows spellcasters to summon a floating Spear that can attack enemies.
variants.description:
Summon a floating, spectral Spear. It can use:
* Spear Thrust: Skewer a target upon your holy spike.
* Piercing Strike: Stab an enemy and possibly inflict Gaping Wounds.
* Fly: Fly to a target position.
variants.higherLevels: Upcast: For every 2 Spell Slot Levels higher than the original, the weapon gains 8|Healing and deals an additional 1d8|Force damage.

variants.name: Spiritual Weapon: Trident
variants.summary: This spell is a variant of the Level 2 Evocation Spell, Spiritual Weapon. It allows spellcasters to summon a floating Trident that can attack enemies.
variants.description:
Summon a floating, spectral Trident. It can use:
* Trident Thrust:Plunge your glorious spikes into a target.
* Piercing Strike: Stab an enemy and possibly inflict Gaping Wounds.
* Fly: Fly to a target position.
variants.higherLevels: Upcast: For every 2 Spell Slot Levels higher than the original, the weapon gains 8|Healing and deals an additional 1d8|Force damage.

name: Staggering Smite
summary: This spell is only available for NPCs. It allows spellcasters to cause their weapon to attack their victims minds with Psychic damage as they strike.
description: Possibly Stagger your target. It can't take reactions and is more likely to miss.

name: Stinking Cloud
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to create a nauseating cloud of gas that can prevent creatures from taking Actions. Targets must make Constitution SavingThrows every turn while they're in the area of effect or become Nauseous.
description: Create a cloud of gas so nauseating it prevents creatures from taking actions.

name: Stoneskin
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to harden the skin of their ally, granting them Resistance to non-magical physical damage.
description: Turn a creature's flesh hard as stone. It takes only half the damage of all non-magical Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage.

name: Sunbeam
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to project a beam of light, Blinding and dealing Radiant damage to everything in its path. You can then use Recast Sunbeam on subsequent turns without expending a Spell Slot.
description: A beam of brilliant light sears and Blinds all creatures in its path.

name: Tasha's Hideous Laughter
summary: It allows spellcasters to send a targeted creature into a fit of laughter, falling Prone.
description:
Leave a creature Prone with laughter, without the ability to get up.

The creature must have an Intelligence of 5 or more.
The target can try to shake off the effect each time it takes damage.

name: Telekinesis
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to throw creatures and objects around with only their mind.
description:
Throw a creature or object up to m=18|ft=60 with a thought. Once per turn, you can use Telekinesis again without expending a Spell Slot. Heavier items deal more damage when thrown in this manner.

10

name: Thaumaturgy
summary: It temporarily improves the caster's Intimidation and Performance checks.
description: Gain Advantage on Intimidation and Performance Checks.

name: Thorn Whip
summary: It deals damage to a target and pulls it closer to the caster.
description:
Pulls the creature m=3|ft=10 closer to you.

The target cannot be pulled if it is Huge in size.
higherLevels:
When the spellcaster reaches Level 5, the damage increases to 2d6|Piercing.
When the spellcaster reaches Level 10, the damage increases to 3d6|Piercing.

name: Thunderous Smite
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to cause their weapon to ring with Thunder as they strike, pushing targets away and potentially knocking them Prone.
description: Your weapon rings with thunder as you strike, pushing your target m=3|ft=10 away and possibly knocking them Prone.

name: Thunderwave
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to project out a deafening force that can hit multiple creatures and objects. Creatures hit by this force are potentially pushed away from the spellcaster.
description: Release a wave of thunderous force that pushes away all creatures and objects in an area, while also dealing Thunder damage.
higherLevels: Upcast: Casting this spell at a higher level deals an extra 1d8|Thunder damage for each Spell Slot Level above 1st.

name: True Strike
summary: The caster gains Advantage on their next Attack Roll against the target.
description: Gain Advantage on your next Attack Roll.

name: Vampiric Touch
summary: This spell allows spellcasters at melee range to siphon the life force of their target.
description:
Touch an enemy to siphon their life force and regain half as many Hit Points.

For 10 turns, you can use Vampiric Touch again without expending an additional Spell Slot.
higherLevels: Upcast: Casting this spell at a higher level deals an extra 1d6|Necrotic damage for each Spell Slot Level above 3rd.

name: Vicious Mockery
summary: It deals Psychic damage to enemies and inflicts Disadvantage on their Attack Rolls.
description: Insult a creature: it has Disadvantage on its next Attack Roll.
higherLevels:
When the spellcaster reaches Level 5, the damage increases to 2d4|Psychic.
When the spellcaster reaches Level 10, the damage increases to 3d4|Psychic.

name: Wall of Fire
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to create a long, fiery barrier, damaging anything in the area.
description: Create a blazing wall of fire, Burning anyone who dares stand too close. Deals Fire to anything that moves into or starts it's turn in the area.
higherLevels: Upcast: Casting this spell at a higher level deals an extra 1d8|Fire damage for each Spell Slot Level above 4th.

name: Wall of Ice
description: Raise a wall of solid ice that deals 10d6|Cold damage to anyone standing in its way. When the ice is broken, it leaves behind a cloud of frigid air that deals 10d6|Cold per turn to creatures within.

name: Wall of Stone
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to create a solid stone barrier.
description:
Raise a wall of non-magical, solid stone.

The wall can be created between any two points within range as long as there is a clear path between them.  It is made up of Stone Pillars with 30 HP each, immune to Psychic and vulnerable to Force and Thunder damage.  Pillars block movement and line of sight.

name: Wall of Thorns
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to conjure a wall of brambles, Entangling and damaging any creatures who are in the area, or trying to pass through.
description: Create a wall of pliable, twisting thorns surrounded by Entangling vines. Creatures can move through the wall, but take 7d8|Piercing damage per turn, their Movement Speed is quartered due to Difficult Terrain, and they may become Entangled.

name: Warden of Vitality
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to heal allies repeatedly with Restore Vitality using only Bonus Actions for 10 turns.
description: While this aura lasts, you can cast Restore Vitality as a bonus to heal yourself or nearby allies by 2d6|Healing.

name: Warding Bond
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to bolster an ally's defenses while also sharing any damage they receive.
description:
Ward an ally. They gain Resistance to all damage, and a +1 bonus to their Armour Class and SavingThrows.
Each time the target takes damage, the spellcaster takes the same amount of damage.

name: Web
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to conjure a mass of sticky and flammable web at an area within range. Creatures moving or entering this area have their speed halved and can become Enwebbed.
description:
Cover an area in thick, flammable webbing that can Enweb creatures within.

An ally can use its Help action to try and tear away the webs.

name: Wind Walk
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to transform a group of allies into a cloud of mist. This form offers damage Resistance, Advantage on some Saving Throws, and the ability to Fly.
description:
Transform yourself and all nearby party members into tiny clouds of mist to avoid attacks. You become Resistant to non-magical damage, gain Advantage on Constitution, Dexterity, and Strength SavingThrows, and become Tiny in size. You also gain the ability to Fly.

While transformed, you won't be able to attack, cast spells, or talk.

name: Witch Bolt
summary: It allows spellcasters to hit enemies with a blue ray of electrifying energy that deals Lightning damage to them initially and also on subsequent turns.
description: Link yourself to a target with a bolt of lightning. Deal an additional 1d12|Lightning each turn by activating it.
higherLevels: Upcast: The initial damage increases by 1d12|Lightning per level. Damage on subsequent turns is always 1d12|Lightning

name: Wrathful Smite
summary: This spell allows spellcasters to channel their wrath through their melee weapon, possibly Frightening their target on hit.
description: Your weapon absorbs your wrath as you strike, possibly Frightening your target.
